A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing. While critics seem to love this movie\, a lot of fans like myself don’t understand the love. Some of the issue are with the story\, some of it with the pacing and some of it with the acting. In particular\, the dark\, brooding Luke/Mark comes across more as a grumpy old guy that a tortured soul (get off my lawn/planet). The whole trip to find the “code breaker” was filler. And the humor that was inserted made the film feel like it was trying to copy the Marvel formula. I love the Marvel movies\, but that is not the right tone to use for Star Wars. Every Star Wars fan is going to see this movie\, but I doubt that most of them will be satisfied.
